content: bellmund is a cross-season staple perfect for layering over dresses buttondowns or tees worked from the bottom up with a strand of vintage dk and a strand of aerial held together this popover features a deep split hem stockinette body and ribbed trims finished measurements bust 36 40 44 \ 48 52 56 60 64 68 72 / 91 5 101 5 112 \ 122 132 142 152 5 162 5 172 5 183 cm length 19 19 20¼ \ 21¾ 22¾ 22¾ 24¾ 24¾ 24¾ 26¾ / 48 5 48 5 51 5 \ 55 58 58 63 63 63 68 cm shown in size 44 /112 cm recommended ease 2 4 /5 10 cm of positive ease yarn berroco vintage dk 100g 3 4 4 \ 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 hanks#2141 wisteria c1 berroco aerial 25g 3 4 4 \ 5 5 6 7 7 7 8 balls #3490 eggplant c2 needles and notions 16 /40 cm circular needles sizes 4/3 5 mm and 6/4 mm or size to obtain gauge 32 /80 cm circular needles sizes 4/3 5 mm and 6/4 mm stitch markers tapestry needle waste yarn or stitch holder gauge 22 sts and 28 row = 4 /10 cm in st st using larger needle gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge
